timeline.message:
[rrd4j] Improve performance

* Cache item to improve performance
* Also return DecimalType for QuantityType values

Related to #8928
Reintroduces #8809

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>

timeline.bodyText: Afaics, we didn't have this warning before - and I'd think that there might be legit situations for a query even if no db file is there (yet).
timeline.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: Yes it was meant to be debug level. I'll change that.
replies.author: wborn

replies.bodyText: I only reduced the amount of of nesting/indentation with this quick return statement. That makes the code a bit more readable. Moving logic to other methods also helps with that.
replies.author: wborn

replies.bodyText: Yes, I saw and understood that - although it made it trickier to review and see the parts that are the real change in it.
replies.author: kaikreuzer

timeline.message:
Fix log level

Signed-off-by: Wouter Born <github@maindrain.net>
